AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.text: A project management professional with a passion for learning.  Effective at combining creativity and problem solving to overcome challenges and motivate teams. Known among staff and colleagues for strong leadership, attention to detail and positive attitude no matter the complexity of the challenge or task to deliver success.  Oh...I can also code.  Full Stack Development knowledge including: CSS, HTML, JavaScript, MySQL, MongoDB, Node, Express and React.
